summary: SummaryGot2b Glued 2-in-1 Brow & Edge Gel is the 1st styling touch-up brush specifically designed to fix and shape both your edges and brows. The gel is fast drying with a non-sticky feel and will keep your brows and edges in perfect shape on-the-go. Clinically tested by dermatologists.
details: DetailsBenefitsTame the untameable. Style and fix your runaways with the got2b glue eyebrow gel, also easy on the go at any time.Brows & Edges - Shape your eyebrows in no time and give your hairline a stunning, long-lasting look - all day long.Styling on the go - Got2b's little superstar fits perfectly in any of your handbags and is super easy to use thanks to its two-sided eyebrow brush.The got2b brow and hair gel is free of ingredients of animal origin. Unfortunately, it must not be applied to the eyelashes.Item 2615387How To UseApplied in no time at all - you can apply the Eyebrow Gel easy with the wide side, and style and fix your brows and hair contours with the narrow side.IngredientsAqua (Water, Eau), PVP, Acrylates/Hydroxyesters Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates/Steareth-20 Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Aminomethyl Propanol, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Caprylyl Glycol, Glycerin, Parfum (Fragrance), Ethylhexylglycerin, Panthenol, Benzoic Acid, Sodium BenzoateShipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Applied in no time at all - you can apply the Eyebrow Gel easy with the wide side, and style and fix your brows and hair contours with the narrow side.

reviews.headline: Use on my brows and didnt like it
reviews.comments: This product didn't keep my brow hairs in place as much, and made them flaky after a while.

Ugh just amazing! But beware , if you put tooo much on , it will give a peeling white effect, however, when and if i do put to much ill simply wipe the excess off with my finger tip and let it dry and wipe excess from around my brows or skin and all is good (: bought it for the 2nd time just to write a great review.

reviews.headline: Repeat buyer
reviews.comments: Use this on my brows and I'm obsessed

reviews.headline: Love this product!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love it! Its perfect for my hair fly aways â€¦ if i want to add a lamination look to my browsðŸ©· my husband likes to use it on his beard as well!

reviews.headline: does the job
reviews.comments: i've been using this on my brows for light-no makeup days and i like it for the most part. it tends to flake after a few hours but i have yet to find a clear gel that doesn't. i do like the brush and how big the tube is.

reviews.headline: Not what I exoected
reviews.comments: It was too sticky and did nothing for my short hair flyaways on top of my head. Hair spray works better and is less sticky

reviews.headline: One of my favorite product in ulta
reviews.comments: I used this product in my brows and they look really organic

reviews.headline: Makes you hair and brows flaky
reviews.comments: I like it makes your brows stay very long and drys very quick but when drying it kind of feels like t your skin is thinning. But it l  we saves my hair look like it have a lot of dandruff. The applicator is good and when you pull it out there is a lot of product on it

reviews.headline: brows are so wild glue can hardly control them. AlsAllergic
reviews.comments: I am allergic to the product.

reviews.headline: DO NOT USE ON YOUR BROWS IF YOU ARE ACNE-PRONE
reviews.comments:
This made me break out in tiny whiteheads on my eyebrows. I don't even get whiteheads normally, my acne is usually blackheads. It looks like a rash on my face and is disgusting!!

It works on my hair though so I gave 2 stars.

reviews.headline: Good but eyebrow acne?
reviews.comments: This product worked well. But it definitely caused a pimple to form in my eyebrow.Someone else mentioned that it caused acne in their review. I wish I could have commented on hers in agreement.

reviews.headline: Good but eyebrow acne?
reviews.comments: This product worked well. But it definitely caused a pimple to form in my eyebrow.Someone else mentioned that it caused acne in their review. I wish I could have commented on hers in agreement.

reviews.headline: Eyebrow acne ??
reviews.comments: This gel works SO well. However, my normally not sensitive skin breaks out from this product but only on the skin under my eyebrows/right on the eyebrow line. It is so strange?? Ive never had a problem like that before but I really think this product is just too good lol.

reviews.headline: Genuinely Surprised!
reviews.comments: Worked perfectly on my brows once I learned how to do it, locked them in place for more than a day! Only works if applied generously and then cleaned up around the edges to get rid of the extra gel to stop it from looking flaky!

reviews.headline: It works, but it is not the best product for brows
reviews.comments: It works, but it is not the best product for brows, the one that comes in a tube works better

reviews.headline: Would NOT buy again
reviews.comments: I've been using got to be glued on my brows for years and thought this product would be amazing, it's not and it doesn't work. Literally like every other brow gel out there, I'll stick to my actual gel bottle. This was a waste!!

reviews.headline: Works great!
reviews.comments: Work great on eyebrows.  Holds hairs in place nicely. Strong hold.

reviews.headline: Great
reviews.comments: Keep my eyebrows in its place.  I also apply to my baby hairline to keep it down and away from my face.  Lasts all day long.  Clean product.  Everyone should have this item in their kit.

reviews.headline: Alright
reviews.comments: I use this on my brows. It is better than the ELF product I used, but it tends to leave just a little residue. I guess I still like it, though. The price is better than Benefit or Anastasia, for sure.

reviews.headline: OMG
reviews.comments: I did not expect it to be this good! It keeps my brows in place all day! And a great size for the price!

faceoff_positive.comments: I've tried multiple brow gel items which at the time I thought were great- and then I tried this. I could pretty much throw all the others out they don't compare. This truly holds my hairs in place all day in exactly how I combed them. Other brow "glues" eventually kind of melt down and the hairs go down but this almost feels like it's hair sprayed on if that makes sense lol like I know they're not budging. I also use it for my baby hairs but I have to use a very light hand cause if you put too much it does become hard. I also use a light hand on my brows since if you use too much it'll harden on your skin. I don't wear makeup to work, but I make sure to use this on my brows every single day. It withstood insane wind and rain during my engagement photoshoot so I'll be repurchasing this for sure. I'd even say it's a HG.
faceoff_positive.headline: The best

faceoff_negative.comments: So I wasn't the biggest fan of this product for both my eyebrows and my fly aways but for totally different ways. I used it first for my eyebrows as a base to lay my brow hairs up some before I fill them in. For some reason it wasn't giving me much hold on my eyebrows. I expected more out of the got2b glued named. So then I decided to use it on the little sideburns I cant ever get to stay held back by my headband. This worked perfect at first. The bristle wand is longer on one side than the other and I found it really easy to brush through my hair. It has a really nice like shampoo scent to it (shampoo always smells faintly like apples to me) but then I noticed as I went throughout the day it hardened and got really crunchy. I was kinda embarrassed how it looked. I also wasn't ready to wash my hair so I had to pick the crunch out of my hair as it looked awful. I would use sparingly and make sure you're prepared to wash your hair later.
faceoff_negative.headline: Meh
